acceptance-test-run.title: Podam should handle immutable POJOs with generified collections in the constructor
acceptance-test-run.name: podamShouldHandleImmutablePojoWithGenerifiedCollectionsInConstructor

test-step.description: When I invoke the factory manufacturing for <span class='step-parameter'>class uk.co.jemos.podam.test.dto.ImmutableWithGenericCollectionsPojo
Then the Object should not be null
Then the collection should not be null or empty

Then the collection should have exactly OneDimensionalTestPojo ( booleanField = true booleanObjectField = true byteField = 116 byteObjectField = 46 shortField = 119 shortObjectField = 44 charField = K charObjectField = a intField = -654474487 intObjectField = 1937851084 longField = 753724229311601 longObjectField = 753724227158268 floatField = 0.36664045 floatObjectField = 0.06900984 doubleField = 0.9838590420839529 doubleObjectField = 0.7849750470169912 stringField = je9GLjE8Mf objectField = java.lang.Object@f498ae5 calendarField = Fri Jul 10 00:17:27 BST 2015 dateField = Fri Jul 10 00:17:27 BST 2015 randomArray = [Ljava.util.Random;@366164f0 intArray = [I@6b584b8c booleanArray = [Z@28336ff3 bigDecimalField = 373770159634 ) elements
Then the Map<?, ?> <span class='step-parameter'>{LtreWhd_gY=java.util.GregorianCalendar[time=1436483847619 should contain at least one non empty element
Then the map should have exactly areFieldsSet=true elements
Then the collection should not be null or empty
Then the collection should have exactly java.lang.Object@7b08b589 elements
